properties.entry: SELECT CL_NO , LOCAL_NAME , DISTR_NAME , SUBSTR(CL_NAME, 1, 10) || '...' "CL_NAME" , TO_CHAR(CL_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "CL_PRICE" , CL_THUMB , (SELECT AVG(RE_STAR) FROM REVIEW R WHERE R.CL_NO = C.CL_NO) "STAR_AVG" , (SELECT COUNT(RE_STAR) FROM REVIEW R WHERE R.CL_NO = C.CL_NO) "STAR_COUNT" FROM CLASS C JOIN LOCATION USING(LOCAL_CODE) JOIN DISTRICT ON(DESTR_CODE = DISTR_CODE) ORDER BY CL_NO DESC

SELECT CL_NO , LOCAL_NAME , DISTR_NAME , SUBSTR(CL_NAME, 1, 10) || '...' "CL_NAME" , TO_CHAR(CL_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "CL_PRICE" , CL_THUMB , (SELECT AVG(RE_STAR) FROM REVIEW R WHERE R.CL_NO = C.CL_NO) "STAR_AVG" , (SELECT COUNT(RE_STAR) FROM REVIEW R WHERE R.CL_NO = C.CL_NO) "STAR_COUNT" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.CL_NO = C.CL_NO GROUP BY L.CL_NO) "LIKE_COUNT" FROM CLASS C JOIN LOCATION USING(LOCAL_CODE) JOIN DISTRICT ON(DESTR_CODE = DISTR_CODE) ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC NULLS LAST
